summary: Escalating: no M1/M3 owner/date confirmations yet; will lock provisional defaults unless objections arrive by cutoff.

details.action: Will adopt provisional M1/M3 targets unless objections land before cutoff
details.request: Send owner + M1/M3 target dates or objections

instructions: If you agree with the defaults, reply NO-CHANGE with owners + dates
If you need different dates, reply with owner + new targets before the cutoff
If no reply by cutoff, defaults will be logged and used
